properties.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Coastal Miami Dade County
properties.headline: Rip Current Statement issued January 5 at 3:04AM EST until January 6 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dangerous rip currents.

* WHERE...Coastal Palm Beach, Coastal Broward, and Coastal Miami-
Dade Counties.

* WHEN...Through Monday morning.

* IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away
from shore into deeper water.
properties.instruction:
Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and
float. Don't swim against the current. If able, swim in a
direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the
shore and call or wave for help.

NWSheadline: HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING
